quotes.quote: “The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.”
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: “The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.”
quotes.author: Philip Fisher

quotes.quote: “The investor's chief problem - and even his worst enemy - is likely to be himself.”
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: “Risk comes from not knowing what you’re doing.”
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: “If you find three wonderful businesses in your life, you’ll get very rich.”
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: “Ultimately, nothing should be more important to investors than the ability to sleep soundly at night.”
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: “In this business if you’re good, you’re right six times out of ten. You’re never going to be right nine times out of ten.”
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: “An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.”
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
